    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayManager

        public DisplayManager(PCamera camera,
              GenomeData genomeData,
              MapStyle mapStyle,
              LayoutFactory layoutFactory,
              ZoomSubject zoomSubject,
              DisplayChangeListener displayChangeListener,
              ToolTipHandler toolTipHandler)
        Creates a new manager which handles the display/layout of items on the map.
        Parameters:
        genomeData - The genome data to render.
        mapStyle - The style to render the data as.
        layoutFactory - A factory defining how to construct the layout.
        zoomSubject - Used to listen into zoom events on map.

    • Method Detail

      • setData

        public void setData(GenomeData genomeData)
        Changes the genome data to be displayed. Causes a re-render of everything.
        Parameters:
        genomeData - The new genome data to be displayed.

        Searches for the FeatureItems associated with the passed feature.
        Parameters:
        feature - The feature to search for it's associated FeatureItem.
        Returns:
        The FeatureItems in a List if found, or null if not found.
